participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending my free time reading about different cultures, and learning about the world.
i m allergic to cats.
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions.
I play the bass guitar because it is a good instrument for someone who is well built and tall.

participant_2.background:
I do not really care about my appearance.
I'd love to have lunch with my grandparents and catch up on what's been happening in their lives.
i have asthma.
I remember saving up my allowance for a month to buy a new pair of shoes.
i ca swim very fast.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing?
Hey! I am doing well, thank you. How are you doing?
I am good, thank you for asking. I am just hanging out at home today.
That sounds nice. I am at work right now, but I am not really busy.
What do you do for work?
I am a teacher.
Oh that is interesting. I am a tutor myself.
Cool! I have always wanted to be a tutor, but I do not think I would be good at it.
Why do you think that?
I am not really good at explaining things to people.
I think you would be a great tutor. You seem like a very patient person.
Thank you, that is very kind of you to say.
You are welcome. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim, read, and spend time with my family.
Those are all great things to do. I like to read and spend time with my family as well.
What do you like to read?
I like to read books about different cultures. I think it is interesting to learn about different ways of life.
That sounds like it would be a really interesting book to read.
It is. I have learned a lot about different cultures from reading those books.
I am going to have to check out some books about different cultures.
You should! I think you would enjoy them
